amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that State permit programs would be protective of human health and the environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 231 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 231 (Roll no. 415).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Waxman.
